title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 that focus on dealing with long documents in natural language processing (NLP

author.literal: **"Longformer: The Long-Document Transformer"** - Beltagy, I., Peters, M. E., & Cohan, A.
**"Efficient Transformers: A Survey"** - Tay, Y., Dehghani, M., Bahri, D., & Metzler, D.
**"Reformer: The Efficient Transformer"** - Kitaev, N., Kaiser, ≈Å., & Levskaya, A.
**"Big Bird: Transformers for Longer Sequences"** - Zaheer, M., Guruganesh, G., Dubey, K. A., Ainslie, J., Alberti, C., Ontanon, S., ... & Ahmed, A.
**"Hierarchical Attention Networks for Document Classification"** - Yang, Z., Yang, D., Dyer, C., He, X., Smola, A., & Hovy, E.

container-title: Proceedings of the 2016 Conference of the North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies

author.literal: **"Discourse-Aware Neural Extractive Text Summarization"** - Xu, J., & Durrett, G.

container-title: Proceedings of the 2019 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing and the 9th International Joint Conference on Natural Language Processing

author.literal: **"Sparse Transformers for Neural Machine Translation"** - Child, R., Gray, S., Radford, A., & Sutskever, I.

title: **"Transformer-XL: Attentive Language Models Beyond a Fixed-Length Context"**
**"Long-Short Transformer: Efficient Transformers for Language and Vision"**

author.literal: **"Long Document Classification with BERT"** - Adhikari, A., Ram, A., Tang, R., & Lin, J.
**"Hierarchical Transformers Are More Efficient Language Models"** - Ainslie, J., Ontanon, S., Alberti, C., Pham, P., Ravula, A., Wang, S., ... & Yang, L.
**"Fastformer: Additive Attention Can Be All You Need"** - Wu, H., Xu, Z., Wang, Z., & Long, M.
**"Long-Document Cross-Modal Summarization from Noisy Labels"** - Li, J., Zhang, Y., & Li, X.
**"Efficient Long-Range Convolutions for Point Clouds"** - Thomas, H., Qi, C. R., Deschaud, J. E., Marcotegui, B., Goulette, F., & Guibas, L. J.

container-title: Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition

title: **"Long Document Classification from Local Word Glimpses via Recurrent Attention Learning"**

author.literal: **"Memory-Augmented Transformer for Machine Translation"** - Liu, L., Liu, J., & Lin, C. Y.
**"Efficient Content-Based Sparse Attention with Routing Transformers"** - Roy, A., Saffar, M., Vaswani, A., & Grangier, D.

title: Transactions of the Association for Computational Linguistics

author.literal: **"Long Document Summarization with Top-Down and Bottom-Up Inference"** - Liu, Y., & Lapata, M.

title: These articles cover a range of techniques and models designed to handle long documents in NLP, including various transformer architectures, hierarchical models, and efficient attention mechanisms
